effects: 25% chance to counter physical attacks with Before Swine (505600) to caster (max 2 / turn)
25% chance to counter magic attacks with Before Swine (505600) to caster (max 2 / turn)
name: Before Swine
Before Swine
對牛彈琴
우이독경
Mépris

desc_short: Chance of countering when receiving a physical or magic attack, and enable desperation gnaw and clouds over the moon for one turn
受到物理、魔法攻擊時一定機率進行反擊+1回合內可以使用「好事多磨」「窮途之鼠」
물리, 마법공격을 받으면 일정 확률로 반격+1턴 동안 '달에는 구름, 꽃에는 바람', '지렁이도 밟으면 꿈틀' 사용 가능
Chance de contre-attaquer après avoir reçu une attaque physique ou magique et d'activer Morsure désespérée et Nuages lunaires pendant un tour
Chance, phys. oder mag. Angriffe zu kontern und ermöglicht eine Runde lang Wurmwinde und Wolkenmond.
Puede contraatacar al recibir ataques físicos o mágicos, aprende Mordisco desesperado y Nubes lunares durante un turno
